Description: Limestone ostracon. 11 lines of text on the recto and 11 lines on the verso containing an oath.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (88-94, pl.4)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82869) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82869)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Georgios (son of Sakay from the monastery of Apa Patermute)
Named in inscription: Victor (son of Paham)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
